titleInfo.title: 'File 10/18 (10/17) Allegations of misbehaviour among BAPCO American employees in SS Bandra'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.
The foliation starts at the first page of writing and continues through to the back cover; numbering 1-4 is written in pencil in the top left.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter from the Political Agent at Bahrain to Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO), complaining about the disturbance provoked by American employees on British vessels and the response from BAPCO's General Manager.The reference number 10/17 on the cover is amended and the file was then renumbered as 10/18.
